item.title: Secure and Simplified SSH Key Management with Certificate Authority (CA)
item.description: Create a Certificate Authority (CA) Issue certificates for authorized users Define CA public key and principals name in ~/.ssh/authorized_keys instead of users’ public keys Use key (~/.ssh/id_rsa) with CA-issued certificate (~/.
